stories.text:
I have been on a couple of fun road trips, which involved carefully choosing nicer locations using a lot of online search, browsing through articles, blogs etc. However, some of the most interesting places I found were just because I happen to drive past an interesting road sign and I decided to stop by it.

I am looking to visualize this data using my google maps location tracking. Since there is a ton of information there, which I can export as kml files, however, I don't want to do the manual work of creating the visualization since there must be a tool that already does that.

Either-ways, ping me if you're interested in hashing out a good solution for this, I have a couple of ideas I want to soundboard.
stories.title: Ask HN: What's a great way to visualize/showcase my roadtrips?
